events.title: Racing + Earth Wind & Fire Experience by Al McKay
events.description: It is your responsibility to check the suitability of an event for any children in your party regardless of official age restrictions, this includes considering the type of audience the event is likely to attract and whether such an audience is a suitable environment for children in your party. Refunds will not be issued if any aspect of an event, including the behaviour of other audience members, causes offence to you or any children on whose behalf you have purchased tickets. We do not recommend subjecting babies and young children to loud music. Children are recommended to wear hearing protection if you decide to bring them. A concert environment is not suitable for very young children. Gates open: 15:30 Racing: 17:40 Concert Starts: after 21:00 Dress code: Smart Casual
